name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles W. SLAUGHTER, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles W. SLAUGHTER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The order and judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia are affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: George J. D’Ambrosio, West Chester, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 975
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles W. SLAUGHTER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 22, 1981.
Decided May 5, 1981.
George J. D’Ambrosio, West Chester, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
